text: Handball Club Toronto is a handball club from Toronto, Ontario, Canada. At the time of their creation, they were the only active handball organization in the Greater Toronto Area. There are senior teams for all genders and every skill level. HC Toronto is listed under the Top 25 USA Team Handball Clubs in the 2018–19 USA Team Handball rankings. As a member of Canadian Team Handball Federation the Handball Club Toronto is competing in the Canadian Nationals. ==Accomplishments== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Senior Male Team |- ! Year !
